messages.subject: Some of you may want to sit down for this announcement...
messages.msgSnippet: Ahem. Are all of you sitting down? OK. I have posted, under Locations , pictures of Okita s gravestone. AND... Are you _all_ sitting down? OK. In Artifacts ,
messages.messageBody:
Ahem.

Are all of you sitting down?

OK. I have posted, under "Locations", pictures of Okita's gravestone. AND...

Are you _all_ sitting down?

OK. In "Artifacts", I have posted pictures of Hijikata's armored headband
(hachigane). At least, the metal part of it. It's got an inscription on the
inside, and a sword scar on the outside.

Nice, huh?

--M.
